title: New runes system is confusing the hell out of me..
body: Ok so its not the keystones or anything in the rune pages thats confusing me,i understand all of it..however its the rune pages themselves that are confusing me. What are the max pages we're allowed to have and how come we cant delete the presets so that we can freely edit the pages in our loadouts etc...this is really frustrating atm because I can only add on 2 extra ones atm and i dont know what to do

replies.body: It's similar to the old rune pages. You get 2 rune pages for free, but if you want more you have to unlock them with RP or Blue Essence.
